sourcesContent:
/* src/components/CardView.js Renders the bingo card in a responsive grid. Supports manual dab toggling and editing the card matrix directly. */ import React from 'react' export default function CardView({ card, players, dabbed, onToggleDab, manualMode, setCard, setDabbed }){ if (!card) return
No card loaded.
const rows = card.length const cols = card[0]?.length || 0 const updateNumber = (r,c,val) => { const next = card.map(row=>row.slice()) next[r][c] = val === '' ? null : isNaN(Number(val)) ? val : Number(val) setCard(next) } return (

Card View

Tap numbers to dab (manual)
{card.map((row, r) => (
{players?.[r] || `Row ${r+1}`}
{row.map((cell, c) => (
{ if (manualMode) onToggleDab(r,c) }}>
updateNumber(r,c,e.target.value)} style={{width:'100%',border:'none',background:'transparent',textAlign:'center'}} />
))}
))}
) }
